'''''Le Scaphandre et le Pufferfruit''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must complete all 3 Pufferfruit training challenges.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Pufferfruit training mechanism can be found underwater in the northwestern section of [[Liffey Region]], near {{Enemy|Cherubic Sea Hare|text=Luachra the Brilliant}}.
